product_name: Pearl Izumi X-Road Fuel II Bike Shoes - Men's
long_description: The Pearl Izumi X-Road Fuel II bike shoes perform well on the trail or in spin class, while giving you the breathability of a running shoe. Flexible forefoot and a nylon plate deliver pedaling stability and easy movement; shoes absorb shock, return energy and provide cushioning on and off bike. Uppers feature quick-drying, breathable mesh and synthetic leather. Lace closure system and low-cut construction provide a light and fast fit, like your comfortable tennis shoes. Rubber lugged outsoles supply superior traction; beveled heels enhance walking motion. The Pearl Izumi X-Road Fuel II bike shoes do not include cleats; cleats typically come with pedals, or can be purchased separately.
short_description: The Pearl Izumi X-Road Fuel II bike shoes perform well on the trail or in spin class, while giving you the breathability of a running shoe.
